page.title: 13Playground Games
page.content: OFF GROUND BUDGE. The object of the game is to get off the ground where you cannot be had but you have to move from place to place without getting caught. Other people can budge you off the ting you are on and you can only stay on for 20 secs. KIT THE CAN.We decide who is it and he counts to 50 fast. We have to get back to the big oak tree without being seen while he looks and defends the tree at the same time.If he sees someone he shouts 1,2,3 seeyou(name). If someone gets to the tree s/he shouts "Kit the can". The s/he is it. CHAIN HE. This is banned because it is dangerous but we still play it. The it has to touch people and they all join in a chain and chase after everyone until they are all caught. The last one is it next time.
